name: upc_api
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dietagram.
Tool description: Find nutrition facts by food name or by UPC (barcode). API supports English, Russian, Polish, Spanish, Bulgarian, Ukrainian
API description: Fetches food information based on a given UPC (barcode) using the Dietagram API.

name.description: The UPC (barcode) of the food item to search for. Default is '4019300005154'.
